DOC.brief_title: Monitoring Platelet Function During Continuous Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Need continuous renal replacement therapy Platelet Count > 100.000/nl Pregnancy Age < 18 year Renal replacement therapy within 7 day prior enrollment
